--Bulbasaur
— 	Tackle 	Tackle - Normal-type 	Tackle: Physical Move 	40 	100 	35 	--
A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.
3 	Growl 	Growl - Normal-type 	Growl: Other Move 	-- 	100 	40 	--
The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stat.
7 	Leech Seed 	Leech Seed - Grass-type 	Leech Seed: Other Move 	-- 	90 	10 	--
A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.
9 	Vine Whip 	Vine Whip - Grass-type 	Vine Whip: Physical Move 	45 	100 	25 	--
The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.
13 	Poison Powder 	Poison Powder - Poison-type 	Poison Powder: Other Move 	-- 	75 	35 	--
The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust that poisons the target.
13 	Sleep Powder 	Sleep Powder - Grass-type 	Sleep Powder: Other Move 	-- 	75 	15 	--
The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target.
15 	Take Down 	Take Down - Normal-type 	Take Down: Physical Move 	90 	85 	20 	--
A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.
19 	Razor Leaf 	Razor Leaf - Grass-type 	Razor Leaf: Physical Move 	55 	95 	25 	--
Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.
21 	Sweet Scent 	Sweet Scent - Normal-type 	Sweet Scent: Other Move 	-- 	100 	20 	--
A sweet scent that harshly lowers opposing Pokémon's evasiveness.
25 	Growth 	Growth - Normal-type 	Growth: Other Move 	-- 	-- 	20 	--
The user's body grows all at once, raising the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
27 	Double-Edge 	Double-Edge - Normal-type 	Double-Edge: Physical Move 	120 	100 	15 	--
A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.
31 	Worry Seed 	Worry Seed - Grass-type 	Worry Seed: Other Move 	-- 	100 	10 	--
A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making the target's Ability Insomnia.
33 	Synthesis 	Synthesis - Grass-type 	Synthesis: Other Move 	-- 	-- 	5 	--
The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.
37 	Seed Bomb 	Seed Bomb - Grass-type 	Seed Bomb: Physical Move 	80 	100 	15 	--
The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above.

The user nimbly strikes the target. If the user is not holding an item, this attack inflicts massive damage.

This attack move's power is doubled if the user has been hurt by the opponent in the same turn.

The user slashes the target with hard and sharp claws. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

The user attacks the target at full power. The attack's recoil harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

19 	Torment 	Torment - Dark-type 	Torment: Other Move 	-- 	100 	15 	--
The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.
22 	Fake Out 	Fake Out - Normal-type 	Fake Out: Physical Move 	40 	100 	10 	100
This attack hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.
26 	Hone Claws 	Hone Claws - Dark-type 	Hone Claws: Other Move 	-- 	-- 	15 	--
The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat and accuracy.
31 	Assurance 	Assurance - Dark-type 	Assurance: Physical Move 	60 	100 	10 	--
If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled.
34 	Slash 	Slash - Normal-type 	Slash: Physical Move 	70 	100 	20 	--
The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.
38 	Taunt 	Taunt - Dark-type 	Taunt: Other Move 	-- 	100 	20 	--
The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.
43 	Night Slash 	Night Slash - Dark-type 	Night Slash: Physical Move 	70 	100 	15 	--
The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.
47 	Snatch 	Snatch - Dark-type 	Snatch: Other Move 	-- 	-- 	10 	--
The user steals the effects of any attempts to use a healing or stat-changing move.
50 	Nasty Plot 	Nasty Plot - Dark-type 	Nasty Plot: Other Move 	-- 	-- 	20 	--
The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. This sharply raises the user's Sp. Atk stat.

This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.

The user covers the target's body with a mass of down that harshly lowers its Attack stat.

In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also damages any attacker who makes direct contact.
— 	Cotton Guard 	Cotton Guard - Grass-type 	Cotton Guard: Other Move 	-- 	-- 	10 	--
The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, which drastically raises the user's Defense stat.
— 	After You 	After You - Normal-type 	After You: Other Move 	-- 	-- 	15 	--
The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.
— 	Peck 	Peck - Flying-type 	Peck: Physical Move 	35 	100 	35 	--
The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.
— 	Absorb 	Absorb - Grass-type 	Absorb: Special Move 	20 	100 	25 	--
A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
3 	Sweet Scent 	Sweet Scent - Normal-type 	Sweet Scent: Other Move 	-- 	100 	20 	--
A sweet scent that harshly lowers opposing Pokémon's evasiveness.

13 	Fury Swipes 	Fury Swipes - Normal-type 	Fury Swipes: Physical Move 	18 	80 	15 	--
The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes quickly two to five times in a row.
17 	Feint Attack 	Feint Attack - Dark-type 	Feint Attack: Physical Move 	60 	-- 	20 	--
The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. This attack never misses.
21 	Scary Face 	Scary Face - Normal-type 	Scary Face: Other Move 	-- 	100 	10 	--
The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly lower its Speed stat.
25 	Taunt 	Taunt - Dark-type 	Taunt: Other Move 	-- 	100 	20 	--
The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.
29 	Foul Play 	Foul Play - Dark-type 	Foul Play: Physical Move 	95 	100 	15 	--
The user turns the target's power against it. The higher the target's Attack stat, the greater the move's power.
34 	Torment 	Torment - Dark-type 	Torment: Other Move 	-- 	100 	15 	--
The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.
39 	Agility 	Agility - Psychic-type 	Agility: Other Move 	-- 	-- 	30 	--
The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply raises the Speed stat.
44 	Embargo 	Embargo - Dark-type 	Embargo: Other Move 	-- 	100 	15 	--
This move prevents the target from using its held item for five turns. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.
49 	Punishment 	Punishment - Dark-type 	Punishment: Physical Move 	?? 	100 	5 	--
The more the target has powered up with stat changes, the greater the move's power.
54 	Nasty Plot 	Nasty Plot - Dark-type 	Nasty Plot: Other Move 	-- 	-- 	20 	--
The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. This sharply raises the user's Sp. Atk stat.
59 	Imprison 	Imprison - Psychic-type 	Imprison: Other Move 	-- 	-- 	10 	--
If opposing Pokémon know any move also known by the user, they are prevented from using it.
64 	Night Daze 	Night Daze - Dark-type 	Night Daze: Special Move 	85 	95 	10 	40
The user lets loose a pitch-black shock wave at its target. This may also lower the target's accuracy.
--Minccino
— 	Pound 	Pound - Normal-type 	Pound: Physical Move 	40 	100 	35 	--
The target is physically pounded with a long tail, a foreleg, or the like.
3 	Baby-Doll Eyes 	Baby-Doll Eyes - Fairy-type 	Baby-Doll Eyes: Other Move 	-- 	100 	30 	--
The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers its Attack stat. This move always goes first.
7 	Helping Hand 	Helping Hand - Normal-type 	Helping Hand: Other Move 	-- 	-- 	20 	--
The user assists an ally by boosting the power of that ally's attack.
9 	Tickle 	Tickle - Normal-type 	Tickle: Other Move 	-- 	100 	20 	--
The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense stats.
13 	Double Slap 	Double Slap - Normal-type 	Double Slap: Physical Move 	15 	85 	10 	--
The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.
15 	Encore 	Encore - Normal-type 	Encore: Other Move 	-- 	100 	5 	--
The user compels the target to keep using the move it encored for three turns.
19 	Swift 	Swift - Normal-type 	Swift: Special Move 	60 	-- 	20 	--
Star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.
21 	Sing 	Sing - Normal-type 	Sing: Other Move 	-- 	55 	15 	--
A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber.
25 	Tail Slap 	Tail Slap - Normal-type 	Tail Slap: Physical Move 	25 	85 	10 	--
The user attacks by striking the target with its hard tail. It hits the target two to five times in a row.
27 	Charm 	Charm - Fairy-type 	Charm: Other Move 	-- 	100 	20 	--
The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. This harshly lowers its Attack stat.
31 	Wake-Up Slap 	Wake-Up Slap - Fighting-type 	Wake-Up Slap: Physical Move 	70 	100 	10 	--
This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. This also wakes the target up, however.
33 	Echoed Voice 	Echoed Voice - Normal-type 	Echoed Voice: Special Move 	40 	100 	15 	--
The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, its power is increased.
37 	Slam 	Slam - Normal-type 	Slam: Physical Move 	80 	75 	20 	--
The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, or the like to inflict damage.
39 	Captivate 	Captivate - Normal-type 	Captivate: Other Move 	-- 	100 	20 	--
If any opposing Pokémon is the opposite gender of the user, it is charmed, which harshly lowers its Sp. Atk stat.
43 	Hyper Voice 	Hyper Voice - Normal-type 	Hyper Voice: Special Move 	90 	100 	10 	--
The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with the power to inflict damage.
45 	Last Resort 	Last Resort - Normal-type 	Last Resort: Physical Move 	140 	100 	5 	--
This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.
49 	After You 	After You - Normal-type 	After You: Other Move 	-- 	-- 	15 	--
The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.
